citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Minutes reviewed at time of the inspection are from the last IACUC meeting held on 8/22/23 . There has not been a
meeting within 6 months of the last meeting . The IACUC shall review, at least once every six months, the research
facility's program for humane care and use of animals. A facility employee stated another meeting is scheduled in the next
few weeks. The IACUC must meet once every 6 months .
CORRECT BY : 4/30/2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility employee.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(c)(1) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Minutes reviewed at time of the inspection are from the last IACUC meeting held on 8/22/23 . There has not been a 
meeting within 6 months of the last meeting .  The IACUC shall review, at least once every six months, the research 
facility's program for humane care and use of animals. A facility employee stated another meeting is scheduled in the next 
few weeks. The IACUC must meet once every 6 months .  
CORRECT BY : 4/30/2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility employee. 
 
End Section
